scripts.generate-verifiers: bun run generate-training-verifier && bun run generate-fairness-verifier
scripts.deploy-anvil: forge script script/DeployAndSeed.s.sol:DeployAndSeed --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --private-key 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80 && bun run sync-address local
scripts.deploy-sepolia: source .env && forge script script/DeployAndSeed.s.sol:DeployAndSeed --rpc-url $SEPOLIA_RPC_URL --broadcast --private-key $SEPOLIA_PRIVATE_KEY && bun run sync-address sepolia
scripts.build: bun run generate-verifiers && bun run js-scripts/rename-verifiers.ts && bun run forge build && bunx wagmi generate
scripts.dev: bun run build && bun run deploy-anvil
